titles.title: Farmworker Smoke and Excessive Heat Protection Act of 2025
Farmworker Smoke and Excessive Heat Protection Act of 2025
A bill to establish an occupational safety and health standard to protect farmworkers from wildfire smoke and excessive heat, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
